column4: ""Wine for the KingsHand;" he told the girl; gesturing Ned to a couch. "I am Tobho"
"and let the man go on. The Knight of Flowers bought all his armor here; Tobho"
"Tobho boasted; and many high lords; the ones who knew fine steel; and even Lord Renly"
"he vowed.  Ned smiled. "Did you make a falcon helm for Lord Arryn?"  Tobho"
"he vowed.  Ned smiled. "Did you make a falcon helm for Lord Arryn?"  Tobho"
"his hands. "It's not for sale."  Tobho Mott looked horror-struck. "Boy; this is the KingsHand"
" "None of us wants trouble; but I fear these are troubled times; Master Mott;" Ned"
"to me; that's none of my concern."  Ned nodded. He decided that he liked Tobho"
